posts.post_content: one thing you have to remember is that this card was from shadowmorr and that is the set with the untap abilities on a number of cards. being able to tap a creature you control in that set is a really good thing.

Posted By: Kontrah (7/30/2011 7:06:02 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I remember this being in the Battle Blitz theme deck, and on the box it said that this was an important card needed in order to activate all the untap abilities. They only put one copy into the deck, and I remember thinking there should be more.  
  
Of course, that deck's main power came not from the untap creatures but from the r/w color synergies, and it wasn't that strong of a deck, but it was a place where this card had its purpose.
posts.html:
I remember this being in the Battle Blitz theme deck, and on the box it said that this was an important card needed in order to activate all the untap abilities. They only put one copy into the deck, and I remember thinking there should be more.

Of course, that deck's main power came not from the untap creatures but from the r/w color synergies, and it wasn't that strong of a deck, but it was a place where this card had its purpose.
